1.0.name: wordpress/diego-cox
1.0.description: Permite hospedar multiplos domínios dentro de uma única instalação do WPMU. Domain Manager is a Wordpress MU plugin. Install and allow multiples URL domains using just one WPMU instalation. This plugin make, WP database upgrades, Vhost.conf creation. APACHE reload - for Fedora 8.
